abstract: Administration of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio announces it has tentatively reached labor contract with city's correction officers' union; if approved, contract will include 11 percent raise over seven years and measures to ensure more efficient prosecution of inmates who assault officers at Rikers Island.
lead_paragraph: If approved, the contract would include an 11 percent raise over seven years and measures that would enable more efficient prosecution of inmates who assault officers at Rikers Island.

headline.main: New York City and Correction Officers Reach Tentative Contract Deal
headline.print_headline: City Reaches Labor Deal With Correction Officers

snippet: If approved, the contract would include an 11 percent raise over seven years and measures that would enable more efficient prosecution of inmates who assault officers at Rikers Island.
